entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
